__e: Your TARDIS got stuck, you killed a lot of people, took over the city, lived like a king until they rebelled against your cruelty, and ever since then you've been hiding out, probably in disguise,
There's a lot of brutal imagery here, and our killer had a lot to choose from.
An apology, an escape from cruelty and evil, only too human?
You also asked me ashore, to show me man's inhumanity to man.
That you could be so cruel, to throw out on the street an old woman and six helpless children.
You can't protect me from all the cruelty in the world forever, Mother.
I mean, there's a number of charges, but the most prominent ones were animal cruelty and the assaulting the officer.
What really gets me is... you know, animal cruelty predicts violent behavior... but until I read that I didn't think it was wrong, you know.
Guy with the cat in the box both dead and alive at the same time, dun, dun, dun, which, by the way, seems like cruelty for animals half the time.
